title: Two critically injured in Hangu blast
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 10 (APP):Two individuals were critically injured in a blast that occurred on the Main GT Road in front of the Vocational College in Hangu, a private news channel and police reported on Saturday.
According to District Police Officer (DPO) Muhammad Khalid, both injured persons were immediately rushed to a nearby hospital for treatment, where their condition remained critical.
The area was swiftly cordoned off by the police, and a search operation was underway to ensure the safety of the surrounding area.
An investigation had been started to find the cause of the blast.
